FuncDef:
The acl number command creates an ACL and displays the ACL view. If an ACL already exists, this command directly displays the ACL view.
The undo acl number command deletes a created ACL. The acl number command creates an ACL and displays the ACL view. If an ACL already exists, this command directly displays the ACL view. The undo acl number command deletes a created ACL. By default, no ACL has been created.

ParaDef.Info:
Creates a basic ACL with a number.
The value is an integer ranging from 2000 to 2999.

Creates a user-defined ACL with a number.
The value is an integer ranging from 5000 to 5999.

Creates an advanced ACL with a number.
The value is an integer ranging from 3000 to 3999.

Creates a Layer 2 ACL with a number.
The value is an integer ranging from 4000 to 4999.

Creates an ARP-based ACL with a number.
The value is an integer ranging from 23000 to 23999.

ExtraInfo: This command is used to create an ACL with a specified number and display the ACL view. If the ACL to be created already exists, this command directly displays the ACL view.
